allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Complete Phase 1: Core functionality and documentation

Phase 1 deliverables:
- Fix init.el roxygen parameter parsing for complex function signatures
- Fix macOS keybindings (Option=Meta, Command=Super)
- Create comprehensive documentation suite:
  * TUTORIAL.md - Complete user guide with macOS-specific keybindings
  * CHEAT-SHEET.md - Quick reference for Emacs keybindings
  * TROUBLESHOOTING.md - Comprehensive troubleshooting guide
  * TEST-CHECKLIST.md - Systematic verification checklist
- Create check-dependencies.sh - Automated dependency verification
- Create test files (test-features.R, test-roxygen.R)
- Create focused Claude skill (~/.claude/skills/emacs-r-devkit.md)
- Remove obsolete installation scripts

All core features verified working:
- ESS with R integration
- Flycheck with lintr and styler
- LSP mode with languageserver
- Company completion
- Styler auto-formatting on save
- Roxygen skeleton insertion with parameter detection
- S7 and usethis integration

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

docs: Document quota toggle and SessionStart hook features

- Add reset time tracking (epoch-based countdown)
- Add weekly usage display (W:11%)
- Document SessionStart hook for startup quota display
- Document /quota-toggle command and cqt alias
- Add jq boolean gotcha learning (tostring vs fallback)

EOF
)")

" printf "1. Daemon Status:

Bash(fi osascript -e "tell application ""Finder"" to make alias file to posix file ""$EMACS_APP"" at posix file ""/Applications"" with properties {name:""Emacs.app""}" echo "âœ… Emacs.app linked to /Applications" /Applications/Emacs.app/Contents/MacOS/Emacs --version)
Bash(head -3 echo "" echo "3. Check Emacs batch mode:" /Applications/Emacs.app/Contents/MacOS/Emacs --batch --eval '(message """"âœ… Batch mode works"""")' 2)
Bash(1 echo "" echo "4. Check if init.el will load:" /Applications/Emacs.app/Contents/MacOS/Emacs --batch --load ~/.emacs.d/init.el --eval '(message """"âœ… Init.el loads successfully"""")')
Bash(then echo "init.el found at ~/.emacs.d/init.el" /Applications/Emacs.app/Contents/MacOS/Emacs --batch --load ~/.emacs.d/init.el --eval '(message """"âœ… Init.el loads successfully"""")')
Bash(head -10 echo "" echo "4. Removed aliases (should not exist):" type gmi gloga peekr)
